name: Just Planets
description:
Submision for the Blackthornprod GAME JAM #2.

Controls

Use the mouse to move the sun

Press the 'Escape' key anytime to return to the menu

Ressources

Alien by bevouliin.com : https://opengameart.org/content/skull-in-a-ufo-spacecraft

All other ressources were made for the game

Systems

If you want to run the game on other OS than windows, you can download the .love file and run it with LÖVE (https://love2d.org/)

You can also unzip the .love file if you want to check the source code
